How many people are affected by centronuclear myopathy ?,Centronuclear myopathy is a rare condition; its exact prevalence is unknown.,GHR,centronuclear myopathy
What are the genetic changes related to centronuclear myopathy ?,"Centronuclear myopathy is most often caused by mutations in the DNM2
